'''1.6''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]],<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/06/minecraft-1-6-pre-release/</ref> released on June 25, 2013.

1.6 was reuploaded just two hours after its release to fix a crash bug with brewing potions.

== Changes ==
* [[Ghast]]s and [[zombie pigmen]] no longer visibly catch fire when going into fire or lava.
